alert.note: Alert for Pleasants; Ritchie; Tyler; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 11:23PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A line of gusty showers will impact portions of Meigs, Washington, eastern Morgan, northeastern Gallia, southeastern Athens, western Wirt, northwestern Roane, northern Jackson, Wood, Pleasants, northwestern Ritchie, north central Mason and northwestern Tyler Counties through 1145 PM EST... At 1119 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers along a line extending from Syracuse northeast to Macksburg, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Marietta, Belpre, St. Marys, Pomeroy, Beverly, Elizabeth, Racine, Coolville, Rutland, Chesterhill, Forked Run State Park, Vienna, Ravenswood, Williamstown, Paden City, New Haven, Sistersville, Mason and Belmont. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 145 and 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 17. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
